name: Tic Tac Toe
desc: This project is a console based game similar to tic-tac-toe

name: Cine Tickets
desc: The goal of Cine Tickets is to book movie tickets for a particular movie ,movie show time, hall theatre location, seat type and seat designation. It manages all the details about the customer, ticket price and hall theatre location.

name: Lift
desc: Lift is a ridesharing management company. Vehicles from other companies are hired under Lift. The lift has its own vehicles, own drivers, and own garage. Other companies must pay a percentage of the income of their vehicles as those companies are under Lift and are used as Lifts vehicles.

name: Nexa
desc: Native android app built using Java, XML and Volley dependencies. Provides weather forecast.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: Personal Portfolio Website. Don't Need Much Info About It, Just Scroll Down. You're Here Only!
